title: I can only upload photos to the Google photos cloud after deleting and restoring the photos
content:
Google photos gets stuck while "getting ready to back up"
I can only trigger the upload after deleting and restoring the photos from trash.

I tried all of the typical ways to fix it like clearing data and cache, removing and re-adding my account, removing and re-adding permissions, uninstalling and reinstalling the app.

This issue is still there and now I can't see all of my older photos (before April 2020) on the first page. I can only see those photos by going to the "recently added" section in Google photos.
